gurmukhi: S`qR sMGrxI Awid kih irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]533]
transliteration: Shattra Sanharaniad(i) Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||533||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Shatru-Sanghaarni” and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed, which O Poets ! you may comprehend correctly.533.

gurmukhi: pnc pHrxI Awid kih irp Air AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ sujwn ]534]
transliteration: Panach Praharniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar (i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Sujaan||534||
translation: Saying “Panach-Praharni” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.534.

gurmukhi: kuAMfj dwidin aucir kY irp Air bhur bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ sujwn ]535]
transliteration: Kuanndaj Daain(i) Ouchar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Sujaan||535||
translation: Saying “Kovandaj-dayani” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the name of Tupak are formed.535.

gurmukhi: Awid inKMgnI Sbd ikh irp Air AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu suGr pCwn ]536]
transliteration: Aadh Nikhanndanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soughar Pachhaad||536||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Nishangni” and then adding “Ripou Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.536.

gurmukhi: piRQm p`qRxI pd aucir irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwir ]537]
transliteration: Pritham Pattranipad Ouchar(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Suddaar(i)||537||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Patrani” and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed, which O poets you may comprehend correctly.537.

gurmukhi: piRQm p`CxI Sbd kih irp Air pd kO dyhu ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur icq lyhu ]538]
transliteration: Pritham Pachchhanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Kau Deh(u)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||538||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pakhini” and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Tupak are formed.538.

gurmukhi: pRiRQm p`CxI Sbd kih irp Air AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur icq lyhu ]539]
transliteration: Pritham Pattranishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soughar Pachhaad||539||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pattrani” and then adding “Ripu Ari”, at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.539.

gurmukhi: pirxI Awid aucwir kY irp Air AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur pRmwn ]540]
transliteration: Par(i)niaadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Haini Cheenoh Chatur Pramaan||540||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Parini” and then uttering “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! recognize the names of Tupak.540.

gurmukhi: pMiKx Awid aucwir kY irp Air bhur aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]541]
transliteration: Pankhin Aadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Tip Ar(i) Bahur Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||541||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pakhini” and then uttering “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed.541.

gurmukhi: p`qRix Awid bKwn kY irp Air AMq aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur ibcwir ]542]
transliteration: Pattran(i) Aadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Chatur Bicdaar(i)||542||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pattrani” and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.542.

gurmukhi: nBcir Awid bKwin kY irp Air AMq aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwir ]543]
transliteration: Nabhchar(i) Aadh Bakhaan(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Suddaar(i)||543||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Nabchari” and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, O Poets, the names of Tupak are formed, which you may improve.543.

gurmukhi: rQnI Awid aucwir kY irp Air AMq aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur ibcwir ]544]
transliteration: Rathaniaadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Chatur Bicdaar(i)||544||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Rathani” and then uttering “Ripu Art” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.544.

gurmukhi: sktn Awid aucwrIAY irp Air pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]545]
transliteration: Saktan Aadh Oucdareeai Kai Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||545||
translation: Saying the word “Shaktani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O skilful persons, the names of Tupak are formed.545.

gurmukhi: rQxI Awid bKwin kY irp Air AMq aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]546]
transliteration: Rathaniaadh Bakhaan(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||546||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Rathni” and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.546.
